languages.text: "Если ведьма говорит о врагах Человечества, что поразили эту обитель благородных навигаторов, то наше оружие быстро развеет их порочную тоску!"
"If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"
languages.original_text: "Если ведьма говорит о врагах Человечества, что поразили эту обитель благородных навигаторов, то наше оружие быстро развеет их порочную тоску!"

traits.locale_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果这个女巫的意思是：人类之敌打算对尊贵的导航者的居所下手，那我们的武器很快就会驱散他们带来的邪恶与苦难！”
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: “如果这个女巫的意思是：人类之敌打算对尊贵的导航者的居所下手，那我们的武器很快就会驱散他们带来的邪恶与苦难！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Si la bruja habla sobre los enemigos de la Humanidad que han asaltado en la residencia de los nobles Navegantes, ¡nuestras armas pronto acabarán con su pérfida miseria!».
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: «Si la bruja habla sobre los enemigos de la Humanidad que han asaltado en la residencia de los nobles Navegantes, ¡nuestras armas pronto acabarán con su pérfida miseria!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「魔女が言っているのが、この航宙貴族の住処に乗り込んできた人類の敵のことならば、我らの武器がすぐにその邪悪な災いを払拭しよう！」
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: 「魔女が言っているのが、この航宙貴族の住処に乗り込んできた人類の敵のことならば、我らの武器がすぐにその邪悪な災いを払拭しよう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn die Hexe von den Feinden der Mannschaft spricht, die auf dieses Domizil nobler Navigatoren losgegangen sind, werden unsere Waffen ihrem gottlosen Leid bald ein Ende machen!"
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Hexe von den Feinden der Mannschaft spricht, die auf dieses Domizil nobler Navigatoren losgegangen sind, werden unsere Waffen ihrem gottlosen Leid bald ein Ende machen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Si la sorcière parle des ennemis de l'humanité qui s'en sont pris à ce noble domaine de navigateurs, alors nos armes mettront bien vite un terme à leur souffrance malveillante ! »
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: « Si la sorcière parle des ennemis de l'humanité qui s'en sont pris à ce noble domaine de navigateurs, alors nos armes mettront bien vite un terme à leur souffrance malveillante ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eğer cadı, soylu Rotacıların meskenine dadanan İnsanlık düşmanlarından söz ediyorsa, silahlarımız bu habis varlıkları çok yakında ızdıraplarından kurtaracak!"
languages.original_text: "If the witch is talking about the enemies of Humanity who set upon this abode of noble Navigators, then our weapons will soon dispel their wicked misery!"

traits.locale_text: "Eğer cadı, soylu Rotacıların meskenine dadanan İnsanlık düşmanlarından söz ediyorsa, silahlarımız bu habis varlıkları çok yakında ızdıraplarından kurtaracak!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
